unnormalised: Mhaka dista, mhozo chacha, Rajesh Sharma, poile pavtt ঋণ kaddpak sodtalo tedna. To Meerutant ek lhan वेपारी aslo, kirana dukaan choloitalo, ani taka vistar korcho aslo. Tannem Mudra ऋण ani her योजनाn વિષે aikollem, punn സത്യേನ್ sangta, to khub bhievta aslo. To sanglem, "Interest rates toh bahut zyada hote hain, bhai!" (Interest दर khub uche asat, bhav!).
normalised: Mhaka dista mhojea chacha Rajesh Sharman poilech pavtt loan kaddpak vichar kel'lo ten'na. To Meerutan ek lhan-vellacho veapari aslo, kirana store choloitalo, ani taka vaddounk zai aslem. Tannem Mudra loan ani her yovzneancho aikuponn kel'lo, punn sach sangta, to khub bichkel'lo. To nirantor mhuntalo, "Interest rates toh bahut zyada hote hain, bhai!" (Vyaj dar khub unch aasat, bhav!).

unnormalised: Tachi mukhel chintna कागದપત୍ରi chintna asli. Taka forms bharchik bari disti nasli, khas korun ऑनलाइन. "Yeh sab online ka chakkar mujhe samajh nahi aata," to sangtalo, "Mhaka hi sari ऑनलाइन vastu samajh nakam.". Te bhair, taka gupt shulkamni chintna asli. Tannem her દુકાંદારાન્ કદડું katha aikolli prosesing fees, uchher bhugtanant dondd ani sakllik aksharachi katha aikolli ani taka bhie aslo ki taka samajh naka.
normalised: Tachi mukhel chint'na kagodpatrani asli. Taka form bhortana khub tras zatalo, khas korun online. "Yeh sab online ka chakkar mujhe samajh nahi aata," to mhuntalo, "Mhaka hem sogllem online pusti samzonk zaina." Tachea voir, to lupchapea kharchache vixim chintit aslo. Tannem dusrea dukandaranchea kodden sangnnea aikleleo processing fees, ushiradean bharpai chukavnnea, ani soglle toreche bareek aksharache vixim taka bhirant asli ki taka hem samzonk mellona.

unnormalised: Tannem suruvat ek स्थानिक સહકારી banank vichelli. Tanni taka 12.5% व्याज ਦਰ p.a. dharun ऋण dilem, punn thodi samapati diyak khub asali. Taka tanchem ghar સુરક્ષિત dhartali, ji taka bori disti nasali. Tannem SBI (State Bank of India) kadun ऋण divunk pait keli, punn ti પ્રક્રિયા khatink disli. Tannem sanglem, "SBI mein toh line mein khade khade umar nikal jaati hai!" (Tu SBI cherant ubho ravun jivant astana kal zalo!). Tacho ekdom boro CIBIL gunn naslo, to 650 aslo, ji taka utkarshak nasli.
normalised: Tannem survatek ek sthanik sahakar bankak sampark kelo. Tannim taka varshik bara point panch tokke vyajan loan divpak dila, punn girenk divpak zai axil'lem thodem chodd aslem. Taka tachem ghor surakxen divpak poddlem, je korpak taka ruchi nasli. Tannem S-B-I (State Bank of India) koddlean loan gheupakui sodlem, punn prakria bhaynkar distali. To mhunnlo, "S-B-I mein toh line mein khade khade umar nikal jaati hai!" (Tumchea jivitantole soglle vorsa S-B-I nt lined ant ubhe ravun sortat!). Tacho C-I-B-I-L score bara boro naslo, to sumara six hundred ani fifty aslo, zannem modot keli na.

unnormalised: Sherak, ek mitraane taka NBFC વિષે sanglo jiv tannem sarko ऋण ditale. Vyaaj thode vodd aslem, લગભગ 14% p.a., punn आवेदन પ્રક્રિયા khub sopi asli. Tankam fakth tacho Aadhaar card, PAN card ani dhakle 6 mahinechi bank statements zai asli. Ani ऋण 48 hrs bhitar dilonk gellam! Tannem Rs. 2,00,000 che ऋण ghetlem.
normalised: Nimannem, eklean taka sangllem ek N-B-F-C vegllean shighr loan divpant. Vyaj thoddem unch aslem, sumara chaudah tokke varshik, punn orz korpachi prakria khub sopea asli. Tankam fakt tacho Aadhaar card, P-A-N card, ani bank statements zai aslelea nimannea so mhoinean khatir. Ani loan challis ani aath voranche bhitor dil'lem! Tannem don lakh rupianchem loan ghetlem.

unnormalised: Tannem ऋण dhartulem ani her prakarach माल jama kelo, billingak ek lahan கணினி srapit kelem ani gharbhitor diunk service-ui chalu keli. Vyapar khub utkarshak zalo. Tannem 2 yrs bhitar ऋण bhartalek pavlem. To kitlo sukhit zalo tedna tannem final payment kelem.
normalised: Tannem loanachem vaprun khup toreche mall samball'lle, billing khatir ek lhan computer bosoilo, ani ghora-ghora divpachi seva add keli. Veapar khub sudharlo. Taka don vorsamni loan bharpai korpak mell'llem. Nimanni bharpai keli ten'na taka khub husko laglo.

unnormalised: Atam, to ani ek ঋণ kaddpak sodta, punn hea vella taka tacho CIBIL gunn boro korun kamti व्याज દર zai. To sangta, "Hea vella, mhaka bori taiyari asli!". To वेगવગેર బ్యాంకో dukanam vishim ऋणacho pilihan tulna korta. Tannem HDFC bank kadun ek promஷனல் offer dukhlli 8.75% vadhyan chalu jata. Tacho gadhna 9% vadhyan cholik poddunk ani to tumkam kam kartaa.
normalised: Atam, to dusrem loan gheupacho yojna korta, punn hea vellar taka C-I-B-I-L score sudharun unnea vyaj darak dhyan divpak asa. To mhunta, "Hea vellar, hanv bore bhaxen toyar astolo!" To vegvegllea bankanchea loanam khatir dhyan dita. Tannem H-D-F-C bankanchi ek promotional offer dekhli jicheant vyaj aath point saat panch tokkean suru zata. Tacho hetu nau tokke vyajak unnea vorim paunddak asa, ani to te khatir kam korta.

unnormalised: Mhaka mhozo chachaacho katho shikhou ki ऋण sahayak zata, punn karkyacher, व्याज દર ani bhartanacho jadwal samajhuk khub zaruri. Soglem વેગળાવેગળા pilihan tulna kara, sakllik akshar dhyanat vapra ani tumi EMIs kadunk shaktai kinakai. Tannem ek সপ্তাহની શરૂઆતમાં भुगतान kara, ಸುರಕ್ಷಿತ பக்கમાં rahuk! Prasnam vichruk bhink namani ani arthik સલાહકાર મદદ ghetum saktai asai zai zalear. Kaslench kaamat poddlear arthik ganit karunk zata dekhun zalear te udhesin.
normalised: Mhaka mhojea chachanchea kannien xikoilem ki loan upyogi zata, punn tem mahatvachem asa ki tumka tachim nemann, vyaj dar ani bharpai korpachi vellpatrika samzonk zai. Sodanch tore toreche option tulna korat, bareek akxaramni chit divun vachat, ani tumka E-M-I bharpaik poddtolim ki na tem chit divun tharavat. To ek satto aadi bharpai kortalolem surakshit ravpak! Bhinat ravun proxn vicharat ani tumka dhen samballpache babtint kosleui madatiche garaz asa zalear tanka magat. Koslench korchea adim tumkam ganit korpak zai ki tem fuddarak trasachem zanvchem nhoi.
